item.title: Microsoft’s AI agents: 4 insights that could reshape the enterprise landscape
item.description: We dive into the most significant takeaways from Microsoft Ignite, and Microsoft's emerging leadership in the area of AI agents.

item.title: Salesforce launches Agentforce Testing Center to put agents through paces
item.description: Salesforce announced Testing Center, a platform that lets enterprises test AI agents responses without touching sensitive information.

item.title: H2O.ai improves AI agent accuracy with predictive models
item.description: AI agents need to consistent, and H2O.ai believes a mix of generative and predictive AI models is the answer.

item.title: Google Cloud launches AI Agent Space amid rising competition
item.description: VentureBeat's viewing of the AI Agent Space revealed only 19 distinct agent models available for use, a fry cry from cloud rivals.
